title: The Fall 2022 Indie Gaming Pick-A-Mix
description:
We couldn't pick a game to discuss this week, so instead we present to you an installment of Oops! All Indie Games. We've got a bumper crop of backlog material for you to dive into, from slime-based horticulture to interstellar mining simulators.

Games discussed: Trombone Champ, Slime Rancher 2, Shovel Knight Dig, Deep Rock Galactic, The Diofield Chronicle, Steel Rising, Squad 51 vs. the Flying Saucers
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Justin McElroy, Griffin McElroy, Russ Frushtick, Chris Plante)
